message: Download, compile and run Wolfenstein 3D from 1992, just for kicks :)

data.message: Ikm to get Full armor, may be it was 18 years ago :)
أحسن لعبة من دول لعبتها في الزمن ده كانت Duke Nukem ، كانت نفس روح GTA دلوقتي كدا من ناحية إنك تلائي مفاجآت في اللعبة وأي حاجه تكون قابلة للضرب وكدا مش static والأباحه والخ :D
Moutaz Shams it was after 95, Wolf was when DOS 5 or so :), oh Duke was after the cd rom was introduced btw
There's a version of Wolf3D for Android on the Play Store :)

I was just playing it under dosbox a few days ago :)

I wonder if it can be ported to linux ;)

The "Doom Clones" (ie: old FPS games) I had were Heretic and Rise of the Triad :D
and I just discovered that Rise of the Triad got a remake in 2013 that's available on steam :D
Sadly, I was 7 years old when I played these games and they were either too scary for me (like Heretic) or too hard for me :S

Since we're talking about Wolf3D and id software (who made the game), I must always recommend the book about the company and the two guys who created it; Masters of Doom.
Check out my (no-spoilers) review
https://www.goodreads.com/review/show/850497671
